quotes.en: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.zh: 我们实现明天的唯一限制，是今天的怀疑。

quotes.en: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.zh: 预测未来的最好方法就是创造未来。

quotes.en: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.zh: 生活就是当你忙于制定其他计划时发生的事情。

quotes.en: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.zh: 千里之行，始于足下。

quotes.en: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.zh: 不管你认为自己能还是不能，你都是对的。

quotes.en: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.zh: 从你所在之处开始，利用你拥有的，做你能做的。

quotes.en: Small steps every day lead to big changes over time.
quotes.zh: 每天小小的一步，久而久之带来巨大的改变。

quotes.en: Courage is the art of beginning again when others would give up.
quotes.zh: 勇气是在别人放弃时仍能重新开始的艺术。

quotes.en: A clear goal gives you direction; focused work gets you there.
quotes.zh: 明确的目标指引方向，专注的行动带你抵达。

quotes.en: Learn more from failure than from success; failure teaches you lessons.
quotes.zh: 从失败中学到的比成功更多；失败教会你重要一课。

quotes.en: The simplest habit done consistently beats the grand plan undone.
quotes.zh: 持续的简单习惯胜过未付诸行动的宏大计划。

quotes.en: Be curious — curiosity opens doors that certainty keeps closed.
quotes.zh: 保持好奇——好奇心开启确定性关闭的门。

quotes.en: Progress, not perfection, is the best measure of growth.
quotes.zh: 衡量成长的最好标准是进步，而非完美。

quotes.en: Kindness is strength disguised in gentleness.
quotes.zh: 善意是以温柔伪装的力量。

quotes.en: Focus on solutions instead of problems and energy will follow.
quotes.zh: 将注意力放在解决方案而非问题上，能量自然随之而来。

quotes.en: Consistency compounds — what you repeat becomes who you are.
quotes.zh: 持续会复利——你重复的行为最终塑造了你自己。

quotes.en: The greatest ideas are born from asking better questions.
quotes.zh: 伟大的想法来自于提出更好的问题。

quotes.en: Listen more than you speak; listening gives you clarity.
quotes.zh: 多听少说；倾听带来清晰。

quotes.en: Time invested in learning always pays the best interest.
quotes.zh: 投入于学习的时间，总会得到最高的回报。

quotes.en: Your attitude colors every experience — choose optimism.
quotes.zh: 你的态度决定体验的色彩——选择乐观。

quotes.en: Dreams without action are wishes; action turns them real.
quotes.zh: 没有行动的梦想只是愿望，行动使其成为现实。

quotes.en: Break big tasks into small wins and celebrate each one.
quotes.zh: 把大任务拆成小胜利，并庆祝每一次。

quotes.en: The courage to try is more valuable than the fear of failure.
quotes.zh: 尝试的勇气比害怕失败更有价值。

quotes.en: Gratitude sharpens perspective — notice the small good things.
quotes.zh: 感恩让视角更清晰——留意那些微小的美好。

quotes.en: A calm mind takes clearer steps than a hurried one.
quotes.zh: 冷静的头脑比匆忙的心更能踏出清晰的步伐。

quotes.en: Hard work builds habits; habits build momentum.
quotes.zh: 努力塑造习惯，习惯创造动力。

quotes.en: Value progress over praise; results speak louder than compliments.
quotes.zh: 重视进步胜过赞美；结果比恭维更有分量。

quotes.en: The right question is often the start of a great answer.
quotes.zh: 恰当的问题常常是伟大答案的开端。

quotes.en: Simplify to amplify — remove clutter to reveal purpose.
quotes.zh: 简化以放大——去除纷扰以显露目标。

quotes.en: Be present — today’s effort is the foundation for tomorrow.
quotes.zh: 活在当下——今天的努力是明日的基石。

quotes.en: Doubt your limits, not your dreams.
quotes.zh: 怀疑你的界限，而不是你的梦想。

quotes.en: Work quietly; let your results make the noise.
quotes.zh: 低调行动，让成果发声。

quotes.en: Good habits are invisible investments with visible returns.
quotes.zh: 良好习惯是看不见的投资，带来看得见的回报。

quotes.en: Action eliminates anxiety — do one small thing now.
quotes.zh: 行动消除焦虑——现在去做一件小事。

quotes.en: Clarity begins with a single decision.
quotes.zh: 清晰始于一个简单的决定。

quotes.en: Respect the process; excellence is built step by step.
quotes.zh: 尊重过程；卓越是一点一滴建立起来的。

quotes.en: Your voice matters — speak what you believe, kindly.
quotes.zh: 你的声音很重要——用善意说出你的信念。

quotes.en: Be the person who brings energy, not the one who drains it.
quotes.zh: 做能带来能量的人，而非消耗它的人。

quotes.en: Confidence grows from competence — practice patiently.
quotes.zh: 自信源自能力——耐心练习便能培养。

quotes.en: Let go of what you can’t control; invest in what you can.
quotes.zh: 放下无法控制的，把精力投在能掌控的事情上。

quotes.en: A single idea acted upon is worth more than a thousand imagined.
quotes.zh: 付诸行动的一个想法胜过千个空想。

quotes.en: Seek progress quietly; results will call attention for you.
quotes.zh: 默默追求进步，结果会替你发声。

quotes.en: When you change your story, you change your path.
quotes.zh: 改变你的叙述，就能改变前行的方向。

quotes.en: Gracious leaders listen before they decide.
quotes.zh: 有风度的领导先听后断。

quotes.en: Take responsibility — ownership turns problems into projects.
quotes.zh: 承担责任——拥有感把问题变为项目。

quotes.en: Be patient with little gains; compounding rewards come later.
quotes.zh: 对小小收获保持耐心；复利的回报终会到来。

quotes.en: Your habits are votes for the person you wish to become.
quotes.zh: 你的习惯是为你想成为的人投下的票。

quotes.en: Don’t wait for perfect conditions; start with what you have.
quotes.zh: 不要等完美时机；用现有的开始就好。

quotes.en: Creativity thrives when constraints focus the mind.
quotes.zh: 当限制聚焦心智时，创造力才能茁壮。

quotes.en: Measure progress by learning, not by comparison to others.
quotes.zh: 以学习衡量进步，而非拿自己与他人比较。

quotes.en: Say no to distractions; say yes to priorities.
quotes.zh: 对干扰说不，对优先事项说是。

quotes.en: Consistency is the bridge between intention and habit.
quotes.zh: 持续是意图和习惯之间的桥梁。

quotes.en: Serve before you lead; contribution earns trust.
quotes.zh: 先服务再领导；贡献赢得信任。

quotes.en: Build a life you don’t need a vacation from.
quotes.zh: 打造一个你不想逃离的生活。

quotes.en: Choose courage over comfort — growth lives there.
quotes.zh: 选择勇气而非安逸——成长在那儿发生。

quotes.en: A good plan adapts; rigidity breaks when conditions change.
quotes.zh: 好的计划会适应；僵化在变化中破碎。

quotes.en: Learn to rest without quitting.
quotes.zh: 学会休息，但不要放弃。

quotes.en: Generosity is a habit that multiplies joy.
quotes.zh: 慷慨是一种会使快乐成倍增长的习惯。

quotes.en: Act with intention; small choices shape a big life.
quotes.zh: 有意图地行动；小选择塑造一生。

quotes.en: Be brave enough to start and wise enough to iterate.
quotes.zh: 既要有开始的勇气，也要有不断改进的智慧。

quotes.en: Freedom grows when responsibility is accepted.
quotes.zh: 当责任被承担时，自由得以成长。

quotes.en: A grateful heart sees more opportunities.
quotes.zh: 感恩的心能看到更多机会。

quotes.en: Take one more step — momentum builds from motion.
quotes.zh: 再迈出一步——动力来自行动。

quotes.en: Simplicity is the result of thoughtful removal.
quotes.zh: 简洁是审慎删减后的结果。

quotes.en: Listen to learn, not just to reply.
quotes.zh: 倾听是为了学习，而不仅仅是回应。

quotes.en: Comfort is a good servant but a poor master.
quotes.zh: 舒适是好仆人，但糟糕的主人。

quotes.en: Expect setbacks; prepare to persist.
quotes.zh: 预料挫折；准备坚持。

quotes.en: Your reputation is built by actions, not claims.
quotes.zh: 你的名声由行动而非言辞建立。

quotes.en: Invest in relationships — they outlast any achievement.
quotes.zh: 投资于人际关系——它们比任何成就更持久。

quotes.en: Use feedback as a mirror, not as a verdict.
quotes.zh: 把反馈当镜子，而非判决。

quotes.en: Curate your attention; what you attend grows.
quotes.zh: 管理你的注意力；你关注的东西会增长。

quotes.en: Be kind to yourself; resilience needs self-care.
quotes.zh: 善待自己；韧性需要自我关怀。

quotes.en: Action clarifies truth; ideas alone remain vague.
quotes.zh: 行动澄清真相；光有想法则模糊。

quotes.en: Aim for progress you can sustain for years.
quotes.zh: 追求可持续数年的进步。

quotes.en: Make time for thinking; it is the seedbed of good work.
quotes.zh: 留时间思考；思考是好工作的摇蓝。

quotes.en: Trust grows from small, consistent commitments.
quotes.zh: 信任来自小而持续的承诺。

quotes.en: Be curious about people — everyone has a story to tell.
quotes.zh: 对人保持好奇——每个人都有故事可讲。

quotes.en: Clarity beats busyness; prioritize the essential.
quotes.zh: 清晰胜过忙碌；优先重要的事。

quotes.en: Hard choices create fewer regrets than easy comforts.
quotes.zh: 艰难的选择比轻松的安逸留下更少遗憾。

quotes.en: Your words shape your world; speak with care.
quotes.zh: 你的语言塑造你的世界；说话要谨慎。

quotes.en: Grow where you are planted; tend the soil first.
quotes.zh: 在所处之地成长，先耕耘好土壤。

quotes.en: Be an encourager; one kind word can change a day.
quotes.zh: 做一个鼓励者；一句善言能改变一天。

quotes.en: Practice patience — deep work requires time and focus.
quotes.zh: 练习耐心——深度工作需要时间与专注。

quotes.en: A disciplined life is built one decision at a time.
quotes.zh: 有纪律的生活由一次次决定构成。

quotes.en: Let experience teach you; reflection makes it wisdom.
quotes.zh: 让经历教你，反思把它变成智慧。

quotes.en: Make your environment support your goals.
quotes.zh: 让环境支持你的目标。

quotes.en: When in doubt, take the next small step forward.
quotes.zh: 犹豫时，向前迈出下一小步。

quotes.en: The best investment is the one you commit to daily.
quotes.zh: 最好的投资是你每天都会坚持的那项。

quotes.en: Light a candle rather than curse the darkness.
quotes.zh: 点燃一支蜡烛，不要诅咒黑暗。

quotes.en: Progress requires both patience and urgency.
quotes.zh: 进步既需要耐心也需要紧迫感。

quotes.en: Celebrate effort — it fuels future persistence.
quotes.zh: 庆祝付出——它为未来的坚持提供能量。

quotes.en: Be quick to apologize and slow to anger.
quotes.zh: 道歉要快，生气要慢。

quotes.en: The mind grows by reading, the heart by living.
quotes.zh: 思想因阅读增长，内心因生活而丰富。

quotes.en: Choose depth over breadth when learning a skill.
quotes.zh: 学习技能时选择深度而非广度。

quotes.en: Give credit freely; recognition multiplies goodwill.
quotes.zh: 慷慨给予认可；认可会倍增善意。

quotes.en: Turn obstacles into experiments — test and learn.
quotes.zh: 把障碍当实验——检验并学习。

quotes.en: A humble attitude opens doors that ego closes.
quotes.zh: 谦逊打开自负关闭的门。

quotes.en: Be dependable; consistency builds credibility.
quotes.zh: 做一个可靠的人；持续建立可信度。

quotes.en: Guard your energy — say no politely when needed.
quotes.zh: 守护你的能量——必要时礼貌地说不。

quotes.en: Find meaning in the work itself, not only the outcome.
quotes.zh: 在工作本身寻找意义，而不仅仅是结果。

quotes.en: Lead by example; action inspires more than instruction.
quotes.zh: 以身作则；行动比教导更能激励。

quotes.en: Turn knowledge into practice and practice into habit.
quotes.zh: 把知识变为实践，把实践变成习惯。

quotes.en: Choose friends who challenge you to be better.
quotes.zh: 选择能促使你变得更好的朋友。

quotes.en: Be ready to pivot when new information arrives.
quotes.zh: 当新信息出现时要准备好调整方向。

quotes.en: Savor small wins; they are the fuel for longer journeys.
quotes.zh: 珍惜小小的胜利——它们是长远旅程的燃料。

quotes.en: Keep promises to yourself; self-trust is foundational.
quotes.zh: 对自己守承诺；自信是根基。

quotes.en: Learn to say 'not now' — timing is often the advantage.
quotes.zh: 学会说‘现在不行’——时机常常是优势。

quotes.en: Great work often begins with a curious question.
quotes.zh: 伟大的工作常由一个好奇的问题开始。

quotes.en: Invest time in relationships; they repay in unexpected ways.
quotes.zh: 投资于人际关系；它们会以意想不到的方式回报你。

quotes.en: Be patient with others; everyone carries unseen burdens.
quotes.zh: 对他人保持耐心；每个人都有看不见的负担。

quotes.en: Practice gratitude daily; it reshapes perspective.
quotes.zh: 每天练习感恩；它能重塑视角。

quotes.en: Create routines that protect your mental bandwidth.
quotes.zh: 建立保护心理带宽的日常习惯。

quotes.en: Stay humble in victory and gracious in defeat.
quotes.zh: 胜时谦逊，败时从容。

quotes.en: A focused mind is the most precious resource you have.
quotes.zh: 专注的心智是你最宝贵的资源。

quotes.en: Act with integrity even when no one is watching.
quotes.zh: 即便无人见证，也要保持正直。

quotes.en: Learn to enjoy the process; outcomes will follow.
quotes.zh: 学会享受过程，结果自会随之而来。

quotes.en: Your future self will thank you for the choices you make today.
quotes.zh: 你的未来之我会感谢你今天所做的选择。

quotes.en: Think in decades, act in days.
quotes.zh: 以十年为念，以日为行。

quotes.en: Clarity of purpose simplifies hard decisions.
quotes.zh: 目标清晰让艰难决定变得简单。

quotes.en: Be present with people; attention is the rarest gift.
quotes.zh: 陪伴他人时专注；注意力是最稀缺的礼物。

quotes.en: Serve quietly; impact often arrives without fanfare.
quotes.zh: 默默付出；影响常在不声不响中到来。

quotes.en: Start small, but start now.
quotes.zh: 从小处开始，但现在就开始。

quotes.en: Practice resilience — bend, don’t break, under pressure.
quotes.zh: 练习韧性——在压力下弯而不断。

quotes.en: Turn intentions into rituals and rituals into identity.
quotes.zh: 把意图变成仪式，把仪式变成身份的一部分。
